> Checkpoints should be much faster in H3 -- and definitely not trigger 
=
> any ConcurrentModificationExceptions. If you can dig up representative 
>=
 deeper stacks from the exceptions in the _out.log, and attach to a new 
> =
issue, I'll try to figure out what might have happened.

Unfortunately I co=
uldn't find any other exceptions or stack traces that might in any way expl=
ain this.

ain I find that it corresponds exactly with a checkpoint event and this tim=
